title: donation of court opinions
abstract:
From: Carl Malamud <Carl@media.org>
Subject: donation of court opinions
Date: March 11, 2008 12:59:03 PM PDT
To: Karen_Redmond@ao.uscourts.gov
Dear Karen -
I was wondering if you might pass along a message to Mr. Duff asking if he might have time for a phone call with me?
As you know, our 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation has placed on the Internet for reuse without restriction 50 years of Courts of
Appeals decisions.  This includes most of F2 and all of F3.  We are preparing F1 now.  You may find
